## IMarketplace.createAuctionListing() method

Creates a new auction listing on a marketplace.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
createAuctionListing(listing: NewAuctionListing): Promise<BigNumber>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  listing | [NewAuctionListing](./sdk.newauctionlisting.md) | The new auction listing to create. |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;BigNumber&gt;

- The ID of the newly created listing.
